name: jestTestExplorer.logpanel
desc: Write diagnotic logs to an output panel.

name: jestTestExplorer.logfile
desc: Write diagnostic logs to the given file.

name: jestTestExplorer.pathToJest
desc: Override the path to the Jest executable. The default behavior is to attempt to detect common configurations.

name: jestTestExplorer.debugOutput
desc: Specifies where to display the output from the Debug process.

name: jestTestExplorer.hideEmptyProjects
desc: Hide projects that do not have any tests from the test hierarchy.

name: jestTestExplorer.flattenExplorer
desc: When true, tests in the Test Explorer will be grouped only by `describe` labels instead of file/folder structure.

name: jestTestExplorer.featureToggles
desc: A list of feature toggles to enable experimental features.
